Reviews.Title: Sony's A99
Reviews.Author: Jonnie 6-pack
Reviews.Content: Wowweewowow.I'm professional.  Portrait studio, wet lab, dry lab, framing.  This puts the cherry on the cake.Perfect pictures always. Never a complaint from a lab tech; only been one month but still:)Light weight, fast-quiet-sharp-focus, broad iso range, gorgeous-gorgeous low light shooting,I own multiple Sony A65 and A77 cameras, and this A99 is similar from the outside but is significantly more advanced on the inside.  I plan on testing the video capabilities soon, so can't comment on that... I can't wait.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: I have a Sony a77 and have just bought the a99 which I find interesting with the additional features, and I love it.

Reviews.Title: WoW!!
Reviews.Author: Charles Carnefix
Reviews.Content: The menu's are extensive, the view through the viewfinder is wonderful and it shoots great photos.  I've yet to shoot a video but I'm sure it will be great too!Sony has really come up with a winner here.  If you are a current Sony owner, don't worry it's worth the bucks and all of your favorite Sony/Minolta lenses will work perfectly well with this beauty.If you are new to photography, you can be assured that this camera will fill your needs well.
